body:
If sysctl cant resolve the path it returns a non zero value, but i can't find anything about a scenario where it would fail, and I cant see any of the other OS:s checking for a failure in their resolver so I just left it unhandled, should i set exe_path to an empty value if it fails perhaps?

Or should i perhaps do a 
> return errors::Aborted("could not resolve path ", exe_path)
body_html:
If sysctl cant resolve the path it returns a non zero value, but i can't find anything about a scenario where it would fail, and I cant see any of the other OS:s checking for a failure in their resolver so I just left it unhandled, should i set exe_path to an empty value if it fails perhaps?

Or should i perhaps do a

return errors::Aborted("could not resolve path ", exe_path)
